mapper.select: SELECT 'OO총괄' AS COL1 , 'OO지역' AS COL2 , '1234' AS COL3 , #{dv} AS COL4 , #{pdctTp} AS COL5 , #{pdCdStrt} AS COL6 , #{pdCdEnd} AS COL7 , #{slDtStrt} AS COL8 , #{slDtEnd} AS COL9 , '1234' AS COL10 , '5678' AS COL11 , '1234' AS COL12 , '1-일시불' AS COL13 , '1-정상가' AS COL14 , '3-3년' AS COL15 , '82' AS COL16 , 'A-전체' AS COL17 , '123,456' AS COL18 , '36' AS COL19 , '12,345' AS COL20 , '0' AS COL21 , '-' AS COL22 , '-' AS COL23 , '-' AS COL24 , '1' AS COL25 , '-' AS COL26 , '2022-10-14' AS COL27 , '2022-10-20' AS COL28 , '2022-10-20' AS COL29 , '1234567' AS COL30 , '김지점' AS COL31 , '12,345' AS COL32 , '12' AS COL33 , '0' AS COL34 , '123,456' AS COL35 , '1,234' AS COL36 , '-' AS COL37 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'OO총괄' AS COL1 , 'OO지역' AS COL2 , '김웰스 지점' AS COL3 , '123456' AS COL4 , '김교원' AS COL5 , '렌탈' AS COL6 , '환경가전' AS COL7 , '-' AS COL8 , '2022-1234567-12' AS COL9 , '개인' AS COL10 , '2구 포터블 인덕션' AS COL11 , '1234' AS COL12 , '1-일시불' AS COL13 , '1-정상가' AS COL14 , '3-3년' AS COL15 , '82' AS COL16 , 'A-전체' AS COL17 , '123,456' AS COL18 , '36' AS COL19 , '12,345' AS COL20 , '0' AS COL21 , '-' AS COL22 , '-' AS COL23 , '-' AS COL24 , '1' AS COL25 , '-' AS COL26 , '2022-10-14' AS COL27 , '2022-10-20' AS COL28 , '2022-10-20' AS COL29 , '1234567' AS COL30 , '김지점' AS COL31 , '12,345' AS COL32 , '12' AS COL33 , '0' AS COL34 , '123,456' AS COL35 , '1,234' AS COL36 , '-' AS COL37 FROM DUAL
